Locking

replies.body:
I believe the subcategory in the forums this thread belongs to is the following: https://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=50.

Please direct your concerns regarding your ban to Staff Members by emailing support@avicus.net or making a thread under Appeal an Infraction, which is the link I provided you above.
